subtitles.text: Alex arrives struggling while carrying a box of fruits for Eldran.
Suddenly, something strange shines in the sky... a fireball is heading towards them.
Alex closes his eyes and screams 'NOOO!', unknowingly unleashing a powerful magic.
His fire clashes with the projectile, deflecting it completely.
Alex opens his eyes in shock, not understanding what he just did.
Eldran looks at him with a mixture of pride and concern.
In the shadows, a figure watches with interest... the attack was just a test.
The real danger has just awakened.
